creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: black-green gourd-shaped vessel with two three-dimensional snails crawling on lid; sparsely decorated with red, green, and gold geometric motif on front and back; gold boarder around lip of vessel with purple flowers and inlay
medium: Lacquer, hemp cloth, gold powder, and opal
title: Protection Box "Snails"
